extendedInfo.description: Battle it out in this exciting turn based game of strategy and risk! Play against four other enemies until you have conquered all of the cells. Whether you are looking for a quick five minute battle or a longer campaign of epic strategy, the variety of game modes and options are sure to provide you with an endless supply of challenge and fun!FEATURES- Randomly generated maps for a unique battle every time- Win / Loss Statistics- Four difficulty settings- Various starting scenarios that each provide a different style of play.- Different map sizes

reviews.title: Great game, not so great AI
reviews.comment: I love playing this game, and have spent countless hours doing so. The AI seems off though. It really seems as if all of the other enemies are only trying to wipe me out, and generally leave each other alone. Maybe that\'s how it\'s supposed to be. I\'d like to see a multiplayer version of this game.
reviews.author: Chad Ohlheiser

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.comment: Only criticism is it becomes unbalanced once player falls behind.  Very discuss if not impossible to recover.
reviews.author: Jason Pomerantz

reviews.title: This app is cheating.
reviews.comment: This app is cheating.
reviews.author: Jacques Burger

reviews.comment: Great game, I\'ve spent hours on this, please guys make another game like this!!
reviews.author: Tim Jackson

reviews.comment: Great game
reviews.author: kosmote89

reviews.title: Cool and Unique (updated)
reviews.comment: this  is  a fantastic game with really creative features including everything from the  pleasant colour scheme to the  enormous range of options for each game you play.   i really can\'t recommend it enough.   a solidly 5-star job.
reviews.author: Makaii Melissa

reviews.title: Fun and optionally challenging
reviews.comment: Fantastic blend of luck and strategy. The more I play it, the more nuance I see in my available options. I didn\'t have any trouble winning on easy, which makes it great if I just want to pass the time, but the harder difficulties are always there when I feel like taxing my brain.
reviews.author: Joshua Ball

reviews.title: Good thinking game
reviews.comment: Very playable and can be very challenging.
reviews.author: Grant Delaney

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: My go-to game for the past couple of months! Only wish I could speed up the game play slightly sometimes
reviews.author: Jolie Miller

reviews.title: Simple, fun, challenging
reviews.comment: I\'d like there to be a stats breakdown on game type too.  Also would be nice if I could choose how many colors to play against.
reviews.author: Kevin Lyman

reviews.title: I\'d buy that for a dollar!
reviews.comment: Could use more customizing, opponents, larger maps, faster speed and saving options, but overall a great little game just the way it is!
reviews.author: Ricky Aguilar

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Only two things I want: online multiplayer and a way to turn off the sound.
reviews.author: Brandon Scharr

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Game is awesome. Difficulty is a bit steep between some settings but a good challenge. I wish there was an option for custom maps/scenarios.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pure Strategy
reviews.comment: This game is the epitome of strategy. It is uncluttered by gimmickry and fluff and really satisfies that craving for Risk-styled map conquest. And the lightning-fast, personalized support doesn\'t hurt either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great additions to play!
reviews.comment: Loved the lite version but the new full version options give so much variety! Now I\'m even more addicted!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super fun!
reviews.comment: This is one of the most addicting and fun apps out there. Simple strategy at its best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cell wars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game... Good time killer that isn\'t boring.
reviews.comment: Keeps my simple mind entertained for hours. Almost as fun as watching YouTube videos of dogs jumping on trampolines.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Off line = bored
reviews.comment: Got this for my Tablet and just found out you can\'t play unless you have WiFi for license servers.   USELESS when bored and don\'t have Internet.
reviews.author: Leith Cassone

reviews.title: AWESOME GAME!!
reviews.comment: I LOVED IT SO MUCH I HAD TO BUY IT!!!!  GREAT WORK!!!!
reviews.author: Summer Green
